hero.headline: Your Nails, Our Passion, Always Unforgettable
hero.subheadline: Relax and leave with flawless nails from your K&T Nails and Spa nail technician.

features.title: Expert Technicians
features.description: Our artists are trained in the latest techniques to deliver flawless results.

features.title: Premium Products
features.description: We use high-quality, long-lasting polishes and gels from top brands.

features.title: Clean & Safe
features.description: Your safety is our top priority with hospital-grade sanitized tools and practices.

yelp.title: Community Trusted & Loved
yelp.snippet: Our go-to spot in Cypress! Always clean, professional, and my Gel-X nails last forever. Highly recommend!
yelp.author: A Yelp Reviewer

gallery.title: Our Work
gallery.description: A collection of our latest and most popular designs.

images.alt: Red glitter holiday nails with snowman and Santa design
Elegant nude nails with fine line art and gem accents
Modern white nails with black heart and star doodles
French manicure with sparkling red glitter heart-shaped tips
Funky pink nails with hot pink flame designs
Vibrant long red nails with small white heart patterns

items.name: Refresh Package
items.description: Nail trimming, shaping, cuticle care, 2-min massage, warm towel & polish. (With Gel: $35)

items.name: Replenishment Package
items.description: Includes Refresh Package plus hot oil/lotion & 5-min massage. (With Gel: $38)

items.name: Relax Package
items.description: Includes Replenishment Package plus exfoliating scrub & 7-min massage. (With Gel: $45)

items.name: Rejuvenate Package
items.description: Includes Relax Package plus detoxifying clay mud mask & 12-min massage. (With Gel: $57)

items.name: Refresh Package
items.description: Green tea mint aromatherapy, nail care, 2-min massage, hot stone, warm towel & polish. (With Gel: $41)

items.name: Replenishment Package
items.description: Includes Refresh Package plus hot oil/lotion & 5-min massage. (With Gel: $46)

items.name: Relax Package
items.description: Includes Replenishment Package plus exfoliating scrub, hot oil/lotion, 7-min massage, hot stone & warm towel. (With Gel: $57)

items.name: Rejuvenate Package
items.description: Includes Relax Package plus detoxifying clay mud mask or paraffin & 12-min massage. (With Gel: $67)

items.name: Acrylic Overlay
items.description: A durable layer of acrylic applied over the natural nail for strength.

items.name: Dipping Powder Overlay
items.description: A strong and lightweight overlay with a wide range of colors.

items.name: Builder Gel Overlay
items.description: A flexible and natural-feeling gel overlay to enhance nail strength.

items.name: Acrylic Full Set
items.description: Classic extensions for adding length and shape to your nails.

items.name: Dipping Powder Full Set
items.description: Create beautiful and durable nail extensions with dipping powder.

items.name: Builder Gel Full Set
items.description: Sculpt strong and natural-looking extensions with builder gel.

items.name: Gel-X Full Set
items.description: Fast, durable, and lightweight soft gel extensions.

items.name: Refill
items.description: Maintain your nail enhancements by filling in the regrowth.

reviews.quote: K & T Nails is the best salon in Cypress! My nails have never looked better. The attention to detail is amazing, and the staff is so friendly.
reviews.author: Jessica L.

reviews.quote: Such a clean and professional environment. I always feel so relaxed and pampered when I come here. Highly recommend their deluxe pedicure!
reviews.author: Maria G.

reviews.quote: I'm always impressed with the artistry and creativity. I show them a picture, and they bring it to life perfectly every time.
reviews.author: Samantha P.

booking.title: Book Your Appointment
booking.description: Please give us a call to schedule your visit. We look forward to hearing from you!
